Facebook usage is a net positive for us, he said. He denied the rumours that his retirement was because of increased competition from sites such as Facebook. African Americans have traditionally been the conscience of the country on foreign policy issues, wrote Root's managing editor Joel Dreyfuss . "That's what makes the silence today so startling." . Gartner says Gmail has captured less than 1% of the enterprise e-mail market, counting only businesses with at least 100 paid seats. Managed services partners are jumping on board, though.
